name: The Iron Dome
description:
This game is a reimagination of LTGD's game, LoFireWorks.

The game was also submitted to the Spacespy Jam #2. The game fits the "10  seconds" theme, because every 10 seconds, the game gets harder and your score multiplyer increases.

You can play this game in your bowser, both on pc and phone.

Credits:

+ Colors from : https://lospec.com/palette-list/slso8

+ SFX: https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack (Thx Jonas!) and https://freesound.org/

+ Whiteshampoo: Help with trouble shooting.
